survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with workplace ergonomics and identify areas for improvement to enhance comfort and productivity.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall ergonomic setup of your current workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and clarity.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall ergonomic setup of your current workspace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you currently have at your workstation? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all relevant equipment.

script.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you currently have at your workstation? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort or pain related to your workstation setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale to gauge severity.

script.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort or pain related to your workstation setup?

questions.question_text: Which parts of your body do you most frequently experience discomfort or pain? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Sometimes', 'Often', or 'Always' to Q3
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which parts of your body do you most frequently experience discomfort or pain? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Sometimes', 'Often', or 'Always' to Q3

questions.question_text: Have you received any ergonomic training or guidance from your employer?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to assess training availability.

script.question_text: Have you received any ergonomic training or guidance from your employer?

questions.question_text: What additional ergonomic equipment or improvements would you like to see at your workstation?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What additional ergonomic equipment or improvements would you like to see at your workstation?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the support provided by your employer for ergonomic needs?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point satisfaction scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the support provided by your employer for ergonomic needs?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in participating in ergonomic workshops or training sessions?
questions.client_notes: Include a 'Maybe' option to capture undecided responses.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in participating in ergonomic workshops or training sessions?

questions.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or move around during your workday?
questions.client_notes: Frequency scale to assess break habits.

script.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or move around during your workday?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that your workstation setup negatively impacts your productivity?
questions.client_notes: Use a 3-point scale to measure impact severity.

script.question_text: Do you feel that your workstation setup negatively impacts your productivity?
